Friends

class MGisects

Detailed Description

Define MGisect Class.

MGisect is an abstract class to provide unified interfaces to handle an intersection of two objects.

Member Function Documentation

virtual MGPosition MGisect::isect0_param1 (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the 1st object's parameter value of the intersection.

This function is valid only when manifold_dimension()==0.

Reimplemented in MGCCisect, MGCSisect, and MGCFisect.

virtual MGPosition MGisect::isect0_param2 (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the 2nd object's parameter value of the intersection.

This function is valid only when manifold_dimension()==0.

Reimplemented in MGCCisect, MGCSisect, and MGCFisect.

virtual const MGCurve* MGisect::isect1_param1 (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the 1st object's parameter value curve of the intersection.

This function is valid only when manifold_dimension()==1.

Reimplemented in MGSSisect, and MGFFisect.

virtual const MGCurve* MGisect::isect1_param2 (  )  const [inline, virtual]

Return the 2nd object's parameter value curve of the intersection.

This function is valid only when manifold_dimension()==1.

Reimplemented in MGSSisect, and MGFFisect.

virtual int MGisect::manifold_dimension (  )  const [pure virtual]

Return the manifold dimension of the intersection, i.e.

0: when the intersection is a point, 1: when is a curve, 2: when is a surface.

Implemented in MGCCisect, MGCSisect, MGSSisect, MGCFisect, and MGFFisect.
